name: iFilms Movie Bot
description: When You Will Send File On Telegram Channel Of This Bot, It Will Save That In Database. So, You Can Search That Easily In Inline Mode.

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs, Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

AUTH_USERS.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

SPELL_CHECK_REPLY.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

DATABASE_URI.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot
